tasks.task: Design and implement a vertical farming system.
subtasks: Research and select appropriate crops for vertical farming.
Adapt diets to accommodate crops suitable for vertical farming.
Engineer crops with genetic variants suitable for vertical farming environments.
Investigate the use of nano films and membranes for water efficiency.
Explore the application of fibre optics for energy-efficient lighting.

tasks.task: Advocate for smart and practical urban infrastructure improvements.
subtasks: Consider the economic benefits of vertical farming on urban heat sinks.
Evaluate the reduction of food transport costs through vertical farming.
Assess the energy consumption of vertical farms compared to traditional agriculture.
Compare the water usage of vertical farming with conventional agricultural methods.

tasks.task: Debate the potential of vertical farming versus infrastructure improvements.
subtasks: Weigh the benefits of vertical farming against existing city infrastructure.
Consider the role of public transit and private vehicles in reducing emissions.
Evaluate the impact of passive solar buildings on energy consumption.
Analyze the benefits of high-density living and teleworking on urban sustainability.
